full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` RAB GNAS BKRA SHIS CHAR 'BEBS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE 'DZIN PA'I BRLABS CHEN THUGS BSKYED KYI DAM BCAS GZHAN 'GRAM MA MCHIS PA'I SPRUL PA'I SKU @007B BLO BZANG DGE LEGS MCHOG GNAS BKA' NAN GYIS 'PHEBS PA LTAR SH'AKYA'I BTZUN PA BSKAL BZANG THUB BSTAN GYIS BRIS PA'I YI GE PA NI RIN CHEN RGYA MTSO'O,, ,,)
